description: ContainerStateTerminated is a terminated state of a container.

exitCode.description: Exit status from the last termination of the container

finishedAt.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

message.description: Message regarding the last termination of the container

reason.description: (brief) reason from the last termination of the container

signal.description: Signal from the last termination of the container

startedAt.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.
